home.info_1: During my academic journey, I developed a special interest in software-related fields. I undertook my professional internship at CFE (a government agency) where I developed a web application for data analysis. Later on, as part of my professional thesis, I constructed a web application tailored for medical clinics.
home.info_2: With a passion for programming and a relentless pursuit of a career in this domain, I have now accrued over two years of experience as a software engineer.
home.goodbye: Feel free to contact me if you have any inquiries.

projects.aclaration: Due to Non-Disclosure Agreements, I am unable to showcase the code of my projects undertaken at Infosys or discuss the clients I worked with. The following information pertains to personal projects that demonstrate my skills.

CFE.content: I developed a web application with PHP for automating monthly data analysis. The Legacy Contracts Department used to manually analyze documents with nearly 4000 records within a week or more. Thanks to my solution, the task was reduced to less than ten minutes.

INFOSYS.content: Infosys is an international IT consulting firm. I engaged in a business environment in English with globally distributed teams.
bullets: Contributed to backend development using Java - Spring Boot
Contributed to frontend development using Typescript - AngularJS
Participated in database design (MySQL) and was responsible for the metadata catalog
Practiced Test Driven Development with JUnit and Mockito
Engaged in a server and database migration project. Implemented ETL pipelines with Python, Airflow, Kafka, and Spark. Additionally, involved in Amazon Web Services (CloudWatch and Lambda)

resume.title: Online Resume built with ReactJS
resume.content: I developed this website as a testament to my skills and to showcase my other projects.

cfe.title: Data Analysis Web Application
cfe.source: Project undertaken during my professional internship
cfe.content: I developed a web application with PHP for automating monthly data analysis conducted by the Legacy Contracts Department. It's an MVC architecture application that reads and generates csv/xlsx files with filtered information as per user requests. It includes Administrators, Users, password control, and a user-friendly interface made with Bootstrap.

lishor.to: Targeted towards anyone needing their own Link Shortener
lishor.title: Link Shortener App
lishor.content: I developed a web application with ExpressJS + Typescript for link shortening. It's dockerized and ready to use. My personal goal was to apply all the professional development concepts I acquired at Infosys (TDD, Layered Architecture, Object-Oriented Programming, Data Transfer Objects, Error Handling, etc...)

davel.title: Wordpress Blog for Writer
davel.content: I developed a Wordpress theme for a writer. It features custom styles and specialized post creation (Books). Visit the website to see the final work.

letras.title: Text Processing Web Application
letras.content: I developed a web application aimed at writers. Its objective is to tally and format text with a user-friendly interface. Visit the website to see the final work.
